programme.title: A Qumica do Amor, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma dedicada cientista, determinada a resolver a guerra dos sexos, arrisca sua prpria felicidade para provar que a cincia explica tudo.

programme.title: Muito Bem Acompanhada, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Para fazer cimes ao ex-namorado e forjar uma vida romntica de sucesso, uma mulher contrata um garoto de programa para acompanh-la ao casamento de sua irm mais nova em Londres.

programme.title: Trfico de Mulheres, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Trs jovens mulheres, da Amrica, da Nigria e da ndia, so vtimas do trfico de mulheres, sendo escravizadas para a prtica de prostituio. O lucro pode ser de centenas de bilhes de dlares anualmente, superando o das maiores empresas do mundo.

programme.title: Sobre Amor. Somente para Adultos, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Homens e mulheres procuram por amor, sexo e alguma cura para o tdio em Moscou.

programme.title: Em Defesa de Cristo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um jornalista investigativo, ateu convicto, parte em uma investida para desmentir a existncia de Deus aps sua esposa tornar-se crist.

programme.title: Um Lobo em Pele de Cordeiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em uma terra mgica, em um prado calmo onde ovelhas podem viver sem preocupaes, problemas comeam a aparecer quando um grupo de lobos est instalado nas proximidades.

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget forada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas destruio.

programme.title: Minha Vida de Cachorro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos anos 1950, Ingemar enviado para parentes no interior da Sucia devido doena de sua me. Inicialmente com dificuldades de adaptao e saudades da famlia, ele acaba vivendo experincias marcantes para toda sua vida.

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi cede uma de suas estrelas para que Joey embarque no navio com destino ao Reino dos Duelistas e duele para salvar a viso de sua irm, enquanto Ta e Tristan embarcam como clandestinos para acompanhar seus amigos.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Quando Yugi e seus amigos chegam ao Reino dos Duelistas, Pegasus revela que h muitos segredos estranhos na ilha, os quais tornaro seu grande torneio diferente de qualquer outro que eles j tiveram.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Depois de derrotar a primeira leva de Monstros de Duelo de Weevil, Yugi fica chocado ao descobrir que Weevil tem um ltimo truque debaixo da manga, uma Grande Mariposa voraz que aumenta seu poder a cada turno.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Enquanto Joey procura um duelista oponente que ele possa derrotar, ele se v corajosamente aceitando um desafio do duelista veterano Mai.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey duela com bravura, mas Rex Raptor liberou sua arma secreta: o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Joey precisa descobrir o segredo do presente de Yugi, a carta Mago do Tempo, sem a ajuda de Yugi, ou partir do Reino dos Duelistas no prximo navio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Bakura, um colega de turma de Yugi, possudo pelos poderes escuros de seu Anel do Milnio, prende Yugi e seus amigos em um Jogo das Sombras no qual eles se tornam as prprias cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: PaniK, o duelista de Pegasus, trapaceia e ganha todas as estrelas de Mai. Yugi jura derrot-lo e recuper-las. Porm, o Castelo de Iluses Escuras de PaniK envolve seus monstros numa nvoa escura. Como Yugi derrotar um inimigo que ele no pode ver?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: A Luz no Fim do Tnel

programme.title: Apesar de sua surpreendente desvantagem, Yugi provoca PaniK destemidamente: Vou acabar com voc em trs turnos. Yugi est blefando ou tem a vantagem nesta batalha de inteligncia?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba desce at o reino para enfrentar Pegasus! Ser que Kaiba mudou aps sua batalha com Yugi ou ainda o mesmo duelista impiedoso? A resposta jaz numa batalha entre o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis de Kaiba e o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos de Joey!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A gangue do duelista americano n 1, Bandit Keith, sequestra Joey para uma caverna secreta com um cemitrio como campo de jogo. Enquanto Yugi e seus amigos procuram por ele, Joey enfrenta monstros zumbis que ficam mais forte ao sarem de seus tmulos!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A ltima tentativa de Joey, sua carta da sorte Mago do Tempo, fracassa contra os monstros zumbis de Bandit Keith. Ao passo que sua mar de sorte acaba, ser que suas habilidades melhoradas e amor por sua irm o inspiraro para a vitria?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey combinam foras e se defendem dos monstros de seus oponentes, mas as coisas logo mudaro, j que os Irmos Paradoxo invocam o todo-poderoso Guardio do Porto, um monstro que reflete qualquer ataque!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey liberam cada um o seu monstro mais forte, Caveira Invocada e Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos, mas a fora deles perde a imponncia, comparada ao tremendo poder do Guardio do Porto.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Usando a mgica do Olho do Milnio, Pegasus prende a alma de Mokuba dentro de uma carta bem na frente de Kaiba! Para conseguir o direito de desafiar Pegasus, Kaiba precisa derrotar Yugi e pegar suas estrelas primeiro.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba invoca Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, o monstro mais forte do jogo, a fuso de trs Drages Brancos de Olhos Azuis! Yugi perdeu seus poderosos Monstros de Duelo, mas um duelista verdadeiro nunca desiste!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Gouenji est lesionado e est fora do prximo jogo de Raimon, mas seus adversrios so o time mais fraco de todo o torneio, portanto, vencer no deve ser um problema.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon Junior High est mais forte do que nunca, mas o mesmo acontece com as foras contra eles. Mas to desesperados so seus inimigos para impedi-los de ter sucesso a qualquer custo, eles cruzam a linha e se expem sem querer!
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O grande jogo contra o Teikoku est a apenas alguns dias, mas, a menos que Raimon consiga encontrar um novo treinador, eles estaro fora sem sequer pisar em campo! Toda a equipe est olhando alto e baixo, eles vo encontrar um ou no.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon chega Academia Teikoku para o maior jogo de suas vidas, mas antes que eles possam comear, eles precisam dissipar a nuvem de suspeita que paira sobre o lugar.
programme.desc: Super Onze
programme.sub-title: A final com o Instituto Imperial Parte 1

programme.title: Com Kageyama fechado com segurana, o jogo contra Teikoku comeou corretamente, e um jogo real desta vez. Quem ganha isso sai por cima.
programme.desc: Super Onze
programme.sub-title: A final com o Instituto Imperial Parte 2

programme.title: Raimon ainda no acredita que derrotou Teikoku e o novo campeo do distrito. Depois que a poeira comemorativa se instala, uma figura misteriosa entra no bar de ramen de Hibiki.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon est de olho no torneio nacional e est determinado a venc-lo.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Com Kazemaru ainda na equipe, por enquanto, Raimon pode avanar e se concentrar nos nacionais. E eles precisaro o primeiro jogo contra a rpida Sengoku Igajima Junior High. Se no vencerem, o sonho acaba antes mesmo de comear.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: A estreita vitria sobre Sengoku Igajima deu a Raimon confiana, mas do outro lado do torneio, todo mundo est chocado com a derrota completa de Teikoku nas mos da Zeus Junior High, que 10-0. O que Kidou deve fazer.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Com seu poder de fogo impulsionado pela adio de Kidou Yuuto, a equipe est pronta para enfrentar o Senbayama Junior High e sua defesa inquebrvel. Mas, a menos que eles tenham seu passe coordenado, todo o seu trabalho rduo no dar em nada.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Ichinose Kazuya est de volta! Como uma fnix, ele ressuscitou das cinzas e voltou para visitar seus velhos amigos.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon est se preparando para enfrentar seu prximo grande oponente, Kidokawa Seishuu, que por acaso a velha escola de Gouenji. Certos membros dessa equipe ainda guardam rancor contra ele.
programme.desc: Super Onze
programme.sub-title: A tcnica definitiva o tringulo Z

programme.title: Os trigmeos Mukata e seu rancor domina Raimon a cada passo, mas eles precisam encontrar a fora para superar sua malcia se quiserem chegar final.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O Raimon Junior High chegou final, mas todos esto ficando nervosos por jogar o aterrorizante Zeus Junior High. Endou est convencido de que no bom o suficiente.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: medida que as finais contra Zeus se aproximam, o mesmo acontece com a expectativa e o medo de Raimon. A equipe est trabalhando duro, mas o nvel a ser atingido parece estar alm do alcance deles. Eles chegaro a tempo da final.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O grande jogo com Zeus est quase em cima deles, mas Endou ainda no domina Majin The Hand. O treinador Hibiki decide que todos passem a noite na escola em um campo de treinamento para a festa do pijama.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: isso, chegou a final do Nacional. O Zeus Junior High venceu rapidamente e nada que o Raimon Junior High faa tenha efeito neles. Eles so realmente deuses.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O Raimon Junior High est abaixo de trs gols e est sendo derrotado pelos deuses do futebol do Zeus Junior High.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: A vitria de Raimon prova ter uma vida muito curta, pois apenas alguns minutos aps a vitria o cu cai. De repente, a terra invadida por aliengenas.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O Raimon Eleven se adiantou para tentar salvar o mundo contra os jogadores de futebol da Academia Aliea, mas como jogar uma formiga contra um elefante.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O primeiro-ministro foi sequestrado por aliengenas, e Endou e os outros esto determinados a ajud-lo. A Caravana Inazuma viaja para o parque onde foi sequestrado, pronto para derrotar os aliengenas.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O Raimon Eleven nunca desiste, e eles vo tentar novamente contra a Aliea Academy. Eles vo cara a cara, mas a Academia Aliea muito poderosa.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: A notcia de que Gouenji expulso da equipe no vai bem com a maioria dos Raimon Eleven, especialmente Someoka.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon finalmente chega a Hakuren, mas o que os choca que ... eles veem a mesma pessoa que viram da ltima vez, e foi revelado que era Fubuki Shirou.
programme.desc: Super Onze
programme.sub-title: O Prncipe da Terra da Neve

programme.title: Fubuki oficialmente parte do Raimon Eleven. Mostrando a seus colegas de equipe uma nova maneira de praticar, talvez Fubuki possa traz-los para um novo nvel e reunir a equipe.
programme.desc: Super Onze
programme.sub-title: Quem o novo atacante do Ace

programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Quando todos pensavam que a Terra havia sido salva, a Academia Aliea atacou mais uma vez, desta vez com Epsilon. Essas caras realmente querem dizer negcios e vo bater em Manyuuji em Kyto.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Aps a derrota esmagadora do Manyuuji Junior High, Raimon se prepara para enfrent-los, com Kogure Yuuya ajudando no pedido de Otonashi Haruna. Os resultados so estranhos e desanimadores, mas tambm encorajadores.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon tem um novo membro, Kogure, que faz brincadeiras com eles o tempo todo. Ainda assim, eles precisaro de toda a ajuda possvel.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: The Big Boss, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Lee faces an underground criminal element after members of his family begin disappearing. Now he must break his vow of non-violence to take on the terrifying "Big Boss."

programme.title: Fist of Fury, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee Classic! Lee plays Chen Zhen, a student of Huo Yuanjia, who fights to defend the honor of the Chinese in the face of foreign aggression, and to bring to justice those responsible for his master's death.

programme.title: A Game of Death, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Lo, a champion fighter and movie star, fakes his death to escape and then expose the crime syndicate that wants to control him.

programme.title: Like A Boss, (2020, Screwball)
programme.desc: Best friends, Mia and Mel (Tiffany Haddish & Rose Byrne) are running their own cosmetics company when a villainous beauty mogul (Salma Hayek) conspires to steal it. Mia and Mel must stick together and fight to take their company back.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: Like A Boss, (2020, Screwball)
programme.desc: Best friends, Mia and Mel (Tiffany Haddish & Rose Byrne) are running their own cosmetics company when a villainous beauty mogul (Salma Hayek) conspires to steal it. Mia and Mel must stick together and fight to take their company back.

programme.title: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!, (2004, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Mac & Devin Go to High School, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Rappers Snoop Doog and Wiz Khalifa team up to create this ultimate stoner comedy with a star-studded hip hop soundtrack.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2, (2017, Screwball)
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters, (2020, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, and George Carlin headline this irresistible comedy from director Kevin Smith (CLERKS). It's a heartfelt tale of a suddenly-single father who must accept his identity, and acknowledge what makes him happy.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It, (2011, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Two Night Stand, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)

programme.title: Primal Fear, (1995, Thriller)

programme.title: Knock Knock, (2015, Thriller)

programme.title: Child 44, (2015, Thriller)

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)

programme.title: The King's Speech, (2010, Independent Drama)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love, (1998, Drama)

programme.title: Genius, (2016, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman and Colin Firth star in this stirring drama about the friendship between Thomas Wolfe and editor Maxwell Perkins (who discovered F. Scott Fitzgerald and Ernest Hemingway).

programme.title: The Kite Runner, (2007, Foreign Drama)
programme.desc: Amir is a young Afghani from a well-to-do Kabul family; his best friend Hassan is the son of a family servant. Together the two boys form a bond of friendship that breaks tragically on one fateful day.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Drama)

programme.title: Brimstone, (2017, Western)

programme.title: Gallowwalkers, (2011, Action)

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Heist Films)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Crime)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: American Heist, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: James (Hayden Christensen) and his older brother Frankie (Adrien Brody) turn to underworld connections in hopes that one last heist will be the answer to change both of their lives.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Crime)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: ParaNorman, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Norman Babcock finds his paranormal abilities pushed to their limits to take on zombies and ghosts, and save his town from a centuries-old curse.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer.

programme.title: The Uninvited, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on Kim Jee-Woon's 2003 korean horror film. Story of two sisters returning home to their father from a mental institution, whose recovery is hindered by their cruel stepmother.

programme.title: ParaNorman, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Norman Babcock finds his paranormal abilities pushed to their limits to take on zombies and ghosts, and save his town from a centuries-old curse.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Single White Female, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: SWF seeks female to share apt in West 70s. Non-smoker, professional preferred. An innocent want ad opens the door to murderous, unrelenting terror in this pulse-pounding psychological shocker starring Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh. Rated: R

programme.title: The Substitute, (1996, Action)

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: Nick of Time, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Gene arrives home after attending his ex-wife's funeral. Soon, his daughter is kidnapped. He is given a gun and told that if he hasn't killed that person in one hour and fifteen minutes, his daughter will be killed.

programme.title: Snake Eyes, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Set in Atlantic City, an assassination attempt thrusts a detective into a murder case with 14,000 potential suspects and a deadly conspiracy where nothing is what it appears to be.

programme.title: Single White Female, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: SWF seeks female to share apt in West 70s. Non-smoker, professional preferred. An innocent want ad opens the door to murderous, unrelenting terror in this pulse-pounding psychological shocker starring Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh. Rated: R

programme.title: Sunday, Bloody Sunday, (1971, Drama)

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Interiors, (1978, Drama)

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)

programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Luffy squares off against Cracker, one of the Sweet 3 Generals, as Nami learns the truth about others in the Worst Generation who have come before to challenge Big Mom!

programme.sub-title: An Enemy Worth 800 million! Luffy vs. Thousand Armed Cracker!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An All-out Duel! Gear Four vs. the Bis-Bis Ability

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!

programme.title: Luffy starts to run out of steam as the Biscuit Warriors keep multiplying! If he can buy himself 10 minutes to recharge
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Benefactor's Life! Sanji and Owner Zeff!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!

programme.title: Nami challenges Cracker on her own! During the all-out fight, she loses her advantage and is close to defeat. Can Luffy bounce back in time? Meanwhile, Sanji's tragic childhood is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Past that He Let Go of! Vinsmoke Sanji!

programme.title: The terrible history of Sanji's family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion, he is able to escape, only to face his father's cruelty before setting out on his own.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the East Blue! Sanji's Resolute Departure!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form - Tank Man!

programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1

programme.title: Sanji's journey with the crew looks to be coming to an end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 2

programme.title: Luffy makes a solemn promise to not move from his spot until Sanji returns to him. But as Mama's army advances, that promise may prove a costly one. Meanwhile, Sanji and the Vinsmokes come face to face with Big Mom and his bride-to-be Pudding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!

programme.title: Luffy stands his ground and waits for his friend to return! But the vengeful army washes over him - only a true friend can step in to turn the tide of battle! Meanwhile, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage - and come to a startling conclusion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Adventure! Sanji's Resolute Proposal!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Wait Here! Luffy vs. the Enraged Army!

programme.title: Chopper and Carrot are captured by Brulee and strung up for dinner! But Chopper sees a chance to free himself! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro launch a plan to reach the Ponegliffs - a daring game of chance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invading the Chateau! Reach the Road Ponegliff!

programme.title: Pekoms creates a diversion for Brook to set his plan into action. Meanwhile, Luffy continues to goad Big Mom into a fight, and Pudding begins to have stirrings of rebellion herself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Confrontation! Luffy and Big Mom!

programme.title: Just when Luffy and Nami are in Big Mom's grasp, Pudding arrives, but with news that they aren't expecting - meanwhile Brook and Chopper both make headway getting out of their own jams!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shout of the Soul! Brook and Pedro's Lightning Operation!

programme.title: Sanji hopes his wedding with Pudding will solve the Straw Hat's predicament - but Pudding secretly plans to to avoid the marriage, sharing a secret with Luffy. Meanwhile, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy tries desperately to free himself as the risk of his own well-being! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot continue to search the mirror universe, Brook squares off against Big Mom, and Pedro's past is revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The History of the Left Eye! Pedro vs. Baron Tamago!

programme.title: Luffy struggles to break himself free as Sanji falls deeper in love with the idea of marrying Pudding... But the mask falls off and the deadly charade of Big Mom is revealed as the depths of her treachery come to light!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moist Cigarette! The Night Before Sanji's Wedding!

programme.title: Brook continues his all-out struggle against Big Mom, but his secret weapon might not be enough to save him! Meanwhile, an unexpected ally from the past comes to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Undaunted Soul! Brook vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: Jimbei arrives on the scene and works to free Luffy and Nami! Meanwhile Sanji confronts his sister with the awful truth of Pudding, and she confides in him the powerful secret of their mother's undying love!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Brook finds himself totally at the whim of Big Mom, and comes face to face with her brutal love! Meanwhile, Pedro reveals his explosive plan to create a distraction!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Reach Sanji! Luffy's Vengeful Hell-bent Dash!

programme.title: Chopper and Carrot use the mirror dimension to get in touch with Nami and Jimbei! Luffy makes it through more obstacles to learn that he just missed Sanji! Meanwhile, Sanji wonders alone about the best course of action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Chateau in Turmoil! Luffy, to the Rendezvous!

programme.title: Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding in front of him! Meanwhile, Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under control, but doubt besets Montd'Or.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Deciding to Say Goodbye! Sanji and his Straw-Hat Bento!

programme.title: Nami and the others finally find Brook in the mirror dimension - but he's in the most inopportune of places! Can they challenge the sleeping Mama and rescue their friend? Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor Rolls Over! Rescue Brook Mission!

programme.title: Luffy puts up a valiant fight in order to keep his word to Sanji! But will he be able to last until Sanji arrives at the rendezvous? Meanwhile, Jimbei shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous! Luffy, a One-on-One at His Limit!

programme.title: Sanji and Luffy meet finally - and while he is happy to feed Luffy to replenish his energy, Sanji's explanation of what actions he must take baffles Luffy! The crucial decision, to turn his back on his friends or his family, tears Sanji apart!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The newly reunited Luffy and Sanji hear from the rest of the Straw Hats in the mirror dimension! Then, Jimbei starts telling them about Capone "Gang" Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji Comes Back! Crash! The Tea Party from Hell!

programme.title: The Straw Hats put Jimbei's plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!

programme.title: The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege's team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege's Allied Forces!

programme.title: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd'Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!

programme.title: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom's sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they've got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Spider-Man [Tom Holland] begins to navigate his new identity as the web-slinging superhero under the watchful eye of his mentor Tony Stark.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her familyand unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her familyand unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Gunslinger, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: When the town marshal is gunned down, his wife Rose (Beverly Garland) dons his badge. But now an evil dancehall diva (Allison Hayes) wants her dead and hires a gunslinger (John Ireland), who agrees to kill Rose...until he falls in love with her!

programme.title: Winning Of The West, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry protects a publisher and printer from some crooks who are using Indian raids to cover their bandit activities. When Gene's brother kills the publisher, Genes integrity is in question.

programme.title: The Strawberry Roan, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: Genes first color film stars Champion in the title role as a wild outlaw stallion, branded a killer, and the two-fisted cowboy who fights off a gun-crazed posse to win justice for the noble animal.

programme.title: Zorro, (1975, Adventure)
programme.desc: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragn under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Up in the Air, (2009, Inspirational Drama)

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T01E04

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T01E05

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T01E07

programme.title: 2023. Yugi deve duelar contra o fantasma de Kaiba, criado pela ganncia e cobia pelo poder que Yugi extirpou da alma de Kaiba. Sem suas melhores cartas, Yugi precisa de uma nova estratgia para sobreviver ao Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do Kaiba impostor. Gneros: Anime

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T01E11

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T01E16

The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Barrons Cove (2024)
programme.desc: A man with a violent past kidnaps the boy he holds responsible for his sons death. As he grows closer to uncovering the truth, hes left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his homes previous occupants.

programme.title: Event Horizon (1997)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer (2005)
programme.desc: A resurrected ex-convict (Edward Furlong) seeks revenge against Satanists (David Boreanaz, Tara Reid) who murdered both him and his girlfriend.

programme.title: Wander (2020)
programme.desc: Hired to investigate a suspicious death in the town of Wander, a paranoid private eye with a troubled past becomes convinced the case is linked to the same conspiracy and cover-up that caused the death of his daughter.

programme.title: The Last Manhunt (2022)
programme.desc: In 1909 Willie Boy and his love, Carlota, go on the run after he accidentally shoots her father in a confrontation gone terribly wrong. With President Taft coming to the area, the local sheriff leads two Native American trackers to hunt them down.

programme.title: Cop Land (1997)
programme.desc: The sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) of a small New Jersey police community confronts key men (Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta) on both sides of a law-enforcement cover-up.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Anthropoid (2016)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Drop Zone (1994)
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (Wesley Snipes) turns sky diver to nab a hijacker (Gary Busey) and his parachuter gang planning to invade the DEA.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: Southpaw (2015)
programme.desc: After losing everything to a senseless tragedy, a boxer (Jake Gyllenhaal) turns to a retired fighter (Forest Whitaker) for guidance as he struggles toward redemption.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Twisted (2004)
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Switchback (1997)
programme.desc: A college student (Jared Leto) and a former rail worker (Danny Glover) are suspects in an FBI agents (Dennis Quaid) hunt for a serial killer who abducted his son.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs (2024)
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss, a former homicide detective tries to solve a brutal murder that he cant recall. As he pieces together evidence from a decade-old investigation, he soon uncovers a sinister web of buried secrets tied to his forgotten past.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: Danger Close (2019)
programme.desc: Australian and New Zealand soldiers face overwhelming odds as they fight for their lives during the Battle of Long Tan in Vietnam.

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: The Other Guys (2010)
programme.desc: Two deskbound detectives get more than they bargain for when they take on a seemingly minor case that may turn out to be New Yorks biggest crime.

programme.title: Guns Up (2025)
programme.desc: After a job goes horribly wrong, a man who moonlights as a mob henchman has one night to get his family out of the city while keeping his dark secret hidden.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: Scream 4 (2011)
programme.desc: The Ghostface Killer returns with a vengeance when self-help author Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) arrives in Woodsboro on the last stop of her book tour.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.sub-title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a traveling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies and the FBI
programme.desc: The story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter; exploring the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture.

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)
programme.desc: A goofy janitor (David Spade) tells a radio talk-show host (Dennis Miller) about his search for the parents who abandoned him.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Connect Fishing Experiences
programme.desc: It is summer, so Josh puts the downriggers away and spends a day jigging the shallow waters around the lighthouse at Blubber Bay.

programme.desc: After a tough first day on Cold Lake, Lisa returns with renewed focus and hooks into some hard-earned lake trout on day two.

programme.title: Hooked on Africa
programme.desc: The wildest fishing to be found in Africa and the Indian Ocean.

programme.title: Hooked on Africa
programme.desc: South Africas largest port city, Durban, forms a perfect melting pot of deep calm waters and warm currents, which in turn brings in the big game fish; its time to see what Durban has to offer!

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: Tommo fishes the lower Zambezi River, staying on a live aboard boat and fishing with Cuan Meredith, the owner of River Gods adventures. They fish with baits, targeting a variety of species of fish, some of which are endemic to the lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: Majestic Mount Kenya rises to over 5000 meters and this magnificent monolithis often shrouded by mist and snow, hard to believe this close to the equator.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Fresh off their Lake Powell victory, Denis teams up once again with Austin and Rylan for a new adventure at Dworshak Reservoir in Idaho. Nestled in a rugged canyon, this lake delivers on its reputation with monster smallmouth bass.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild With Mike Robinson
programme.desc: Joe and Nick brave the frigid Arctic seas for the giant Atlantic halibut. Fish butchery lessons as Mike breaks down a 180lb halibut and cooks a festive Thors Hammer.
